title: I cannot consult the details concerning my permaban on my account
body: So i woke this morning and saw that my account was permabanned. The problem i have is that i forgot my email password so i cannot see the reason why i got banned. Can you please link  or just paste it ? That would be{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}  awesome !

replies.body: You were banned for scripting. If you have questions, you can contact player support.
Permabans post the reason when you try and log into the account, they stopped sending emails.
Doesn't your email have a password recovery thing? Send you a text? Answer some security questions? Anything? You can just never use that email again because you forgot your password now?
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en write a ticket to the support
He said he forgot his username and pass and can't login....
If you can prove that you are the owner of an Account with enough information, they can help him retrieve it

Or try logging in again. If it is behavioral then it should tell you why. 
Also, make sure to read carefully. Is it banned or simply locked/suspended?
